sentences.sContent: Despite the apparent clarity around the distinct origins and meaning of the caduceus and the staff of aesculapius, they are both used commonly, and of ten interchangeably, every day.
sentences.sContent_eng: Despite the apparent clarity around the distinct origins and meaning of the caduceus and the staff of aesculapius, they are both used commonly, and of ten interchangeably, every day.
sentences.sCn: 虽然关于克丢西尔斯杖和阿斯克勒皮亚斯杖的起源和意义很明显是截然不同的，可它们每天都被频繁使用，而且经常被相互替换。

words.tran: 可互换的；可交换的；可交替的
